description: The location of all major roads, does not contain local roads or highways. Contains data on size of road, type, length, etc. Fields include average daily traffic counts, locations of count stations, if it is congested, if maintenance is under shared jurisdiction and the year it was built or last updated, political jurisdictions, and more.

name: Colorado Major Roads
